org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd

Class FunkSVDUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.mf.funksvd.FunkSVDUpdater

  • public final class FunkSVDUpdater
extends java.lang.Object

    Encapsulation of the FunkSVD update process. Using this class takes a two-step process:

    1. Call prepare(int, double, double, double, double, double) to prepare an update.
    2. Call getItemFeatureUpdate() and getUserFeatureUpdate() to get the deltas to apply to the item-feature and user-feature values, respectively.

    The updater can be reused for multiple updates, but cannot be shared between threads. It is typical to create one updater and reuse it for much of the training process.

    The updater also tracks statistics across runs.

    Since:
    2.1

        Get the RMSE of all updates done since the last reset.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(int feature,
           double rating,
           double estimate,
           double uv,
           double iv,
           double trail)

        Prepare the updater for updating the feature values for a particular user/item ID.

        Parameters:
        feature - The feature we are training.
        rating - The rating value.
        estimate - The estimate through the previous feature.
        uv - The user feature value.
        iv - The item feature value.
        trail - The sum of the trailing feature value products.

      • getError

        public double getError()

        Get the error from the prepared update.

        Returns:
        The estimation error in the prepared update.
